articles.title: People's Security Ministry Rally Held on Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
People's Security Ministry Rally Held on Kim Jong Il's Reelection
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A rally of the Ministry of the People's Security was held Friday to congratulate Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were Minister of People's Security Ju Sang Song, officials of the ministry and people's security persons and servicepersons of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces.
					
					 Speakers at the rally said that Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK marked a great political event in the efforts to further strengthen the WPK and bring earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Holding Kim Jong Il at the head of the WPK and the revolution provided a sure guarantee for successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the great banner of Songun and brought about a brighter and rosier future to Kim Il Sung's nation, they noted, calling on all party members of the people's security organs, people's security persons and servicepersons of the internal security forces to protect with their lives the WPK Central Committee headed by Kim Jong Il, cherishing the firm faith and will that the country's prosperity and people's eternal happiness are guaranteed thanks to his leadership.
					
					 Similar rallies of workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and youth and students were held in the compound of the Party Founding Museum and at the Youth Park Open-air Theatre on the same day.
					
					 Present at the rallies were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, and officials concerned.  
					
					 Reports and speeches were made at the rallies. 
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il has given steady continuity to the proud history of a great revolutionary surge, brought about significant events in various parts of the country to bring earlier the day of appearance of a thriving nation and caused innovations and leap forward to take place at all units and posts.  
					
					 They underscored the need to attach importance to military affairs and give full play to the beautiful traits of assisting the army to augment the military capability of Songun Korea in every way and make a hot wave of great innovations and leap forward sweep all domains and units of the national economy. 
					
					 The cause of the Korean people is sure to triumph as they have   Kim Jong Il at the top post of the Party and the revolution, they declared, calling on all people to wage a more dynamic struggle for the final victory in the drive for building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the great Party. 
					
					 Similar rallies took place in North and South Phyongan provinces and North Hwanghae Province on the same day.

articles.title: People Offer Heartfelt Congratulations
articles.content:
People Offer Heartfelt Congratulations
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Korean people, including the servicepersons, have offered heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea at the recent conference of the WPK.   
					 Sin Yong Ho, rector of Collage of Literature attached to Kim Il Sung University, in an interview with KCNA during a dancing party celebrating his reelection said that the event was a token of the Korean people's absolute trust in him. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il has advanced the Korean revolution along the road of independence by further developing the Juche idea, carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's idea of attaching importance to the military affairs and establishing and systematizing the Songun idea in a comprehensive way, he said, and went on:
					
					 In the 1990s the country was faced with unprecedented, manifold ordeals and trials. Thanks to his distinguished political ability and outstanding leadership, however, the destiny of the country was defended with credit and the cause of the building of a thriving nation made headway.  
					
					 Yu Ha Jong, head of the Excavator "Jangbaek No.1" Workteam of the Musan Mining Complex, told KCNA that the country had made tremendous achievements under Kim Jong Il's tireless leadership based on love for the people.  
					
					 Such eye-opening events brought about by the Korean people as the successful launch of artificial satellites, underground nuclear blasts, development of the CNC technology, establishment of Juche-based iron, vinalon and fertilizer production processes and the reclamation of Taegyedo tideland clearly indicate that remaining faithful to his Songun-based guidance leads to the prosperity of the country and the nation, he added.  
					
					 Kim Kum Suk, a peasant of the Poman Cooperative Farm in North Hwanghae Province, said that over the last decade when the Korean people had Kim Jong Il at the head of the WPK, they had felt that the invincibility of the Party and army and the dignity of Kim Il Sung's Korea were attributable to his great ideas and leadership. 
					
					 She vowed to always remain loyal to him.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Red Cross Working Contact Made
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Red Cross Working Contact Made
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The third round of the inter-Korean Red Cross working contact for the reunion of separated families and relatives was made in Kaesong Friday.
					 At the contact the DPRK side advanced a draft agreement which rationally adjusted the issues including the issue on the venue of reunion left undecided at the previous two rounds of contacts. 
					
					 It agreed to meet the request of the south side to choose the Mt. Kumgang Reunion Center as the venue of the reunion by accepting it with magnanimity out of noble compatriotism and from humanitarian stand.
					
					 Thanks to the positive and sincere efforts of the DPRK side, both sides at the contact adopted an agreement on holding the reunion of separated families and relatives at the Mt. Kumgang Reunion Center and Kumgangsan Hotel from October 30 to November 5 and holding inter-Korean Red Cross talks in Kaesong on October 26 and 27 in order to solve humanitarian issues including the matter of putting the reunion on a normal basis.
					
					 This made it possible to bring great joy to all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas desirous of successful realization of the reunion of separated families and relatives.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets CPC Publicity Department Head
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets CPC Publicity Department Head
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on a visit to China at the head of the WPK delegation met Liu Yunshan, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee, member of the Central Committee Secretariat and head of the Publicity Department of the Communist Party of China at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing Friday. 
					 Present there were members of the WPK delegation, Choe Pyong Gwan, DPRK ambassador to China, Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the CPC, Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the department, and officials concerned. 
					
					 Liu said that the China visit of the delegation proved that General Secretary Kim Jong Il attaches utmost importance to the traditional friendly relations between the CPC and the WPK.
					
					 Extending warm congratulations to the WPK on the successful holding of its conference on behalf of the Central Committee of the CPC, he stressed that Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK was an expression of the unanimous will and desire of all the party members and people of the DPRK. 
					
					Noting that the Chinese people are rejoiced over the fact that the Korean people are accelerating the building of a thriving nation with hope and optimism about the future under the leadership of 
						Kim Jong Il, he wished the WPK steady greater success in its work for building Korean-style socialism, developing the relations between China and the DPRK, ensuring the people's well-being and preserving regional peace and stability.
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited China twice this year, injecting fresh vitality into the development of the bilateral relations, he stressed.
					
					 It is the steadfast policy of the Chinese party and government to steadily consolidate and develop the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations, he noted, adding that the CPC will boost the mutual cooperation and support, exchanging views on important international issues of common concern with the WPK.
					
					 Earlier, Choe Thae Bok met and had a talk with Wang Jiarui.

articles.title: DPRK to Remain True to Noble Aim of Group 77
articles.content:
DPRK to Remain True to Noble Aim of Group 77
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK Pak Kil Yon, who headed the DPRK delegation to the meeting of foreign ministers of the Group-77 held at the UN Headquarters on Sept. 28 on the sidelines of the 65th UN General Assembly, said that a series of changes that have taken place in the international economic relations in recent years go to prove that the Group-77 was right when it took an option to positively promote the establishment of a fair economic order. 
					 He referred to the fact that the just efforts of the member nations to develop national economies and protect sovereignty are facing serious challenges and the rich are getting ever richer while the poor ever poorer as the days go by worldwide, adding that developing countries are the victims of the world-wide financial, economic and food crises, he deplored, and went on:
					
					 It is the top-priority target of the Group-77 to establish fair international economic relations.
					
					 It is impossible to settle the world-wide financial and economic crises unless the structural contradictions of the unfair international economic relations are eliminated.
					
					 The UN is required to take practical measures to implement the resolution on "the desire for a new international economic order" adopted at the 64th UN General Assembly on the initiative of the Group-77. 
					
					 The Group-77 should continue leading the efforts of the countries of NAM to expand and strengthen South-South cooperation.
					
					 It should continue sincerely implementing the action programme for South-South cooperation and projects already adopted, regarding it as firm guidelines to boost South-South cooperation and thus make a positive contribution to the economic development in the countries of NAM. 
					
					  The DPRK government will remain true to the noble objective and mission of the Group-77 to establish a new international economic order based on the justice, equality and impartiality in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Guinean Acting President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Guinean Acting President
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings on Sept. 28 to Sekouba Konate, acting president of Guinea, on its 52nd independence day.
					 Extending warm congratulations to the acting president and the people of Guinea, Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Cyprus President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Cyprus President
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Dimitris Christofias, president of Cyprus, on its independence day.
					 Kim in the message extended warm felicitations to the president and people of Cyprus, wishing for the peaceful reunification, development and prosperity of Cyprus.

articles.title: Nigerian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Nigerian Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Yusuf Amuda Abubakar, Nigerian ambassador to the DPRK, Friday hosted a reception on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the independence of Nigeria. 
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here. 
					
					 On hand were staff members of the Nigerian embassy. 
					
					 The Nigerian ambassador said in his speech that since the opening of the diplomatic relations the two countries have supported each other as regards international issues.
					
					 Noting that the bilateral relations have further developed thanks to the exchange of visits by high-level delegations, he stressed that the Nigerian people positively support the Korean people in their struggle to achieve the peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 He extended warm congratulations to the Korean people on the successful holding of the Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in his speech referred to the fact that over the last half century, the Nigerian people have registered great successes in the efforts to consolidate the national unity and achieve the independent development and economic prosperity of the country. 
					
					 He said that the DPRK and Nigeria have closely supported and cooperated with each other in accomplishing the common cause of building a prosperous new world. 
					
					 The Korean people will as ever make efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, he stressed.

articles.title: Heads of Chinese Delegations on Sino-DPRK Friendship
articles.content:
Heads of Chinese Delegations on Sino-DPRK Friendship
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The heads of Chinese delegations who participated in the Second Forum of the DPRK-China University Presidents expressed their will to contribute to boosting the friendly relations between the two countries. 
					 Xu Yongji, head of the delegation of the Ministry of Education of China, noted that the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship was provided by revolutionaries of the elder generation of China and President Kim Il Sung, expressing hope that the Korean people would make greater successes in socialist construction in the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude, true to the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Zhan Tao, president of Jilin University, who led the delegation of Chinese universities said that 
						Kim Jong Il's visit to China contributed to putting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries onto a new stage, adding that the members of the delegation would positively contribute to the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations through their diverse cooperation and exchange.
					
					 Li Qingzhou, chairman of the Xiamen Association for International Friendly Contact, who led the delegation of the Local Association for International Friendly Contact of China noted that he was pleased with the fact that the Sino-DPRK friendly relations with a long history and tradition are growing stronger under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries, stressing that the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship would be evergreen.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees and Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were awarded to intellectuals with due ceremony on Thursday in recognition of their great scientific and technological achievements made in the efforts to build a thriving nation.
					 The title of academician was conferred upon Hong Wan Thae, head of a branch of the Jongju Poultry Bio-pharmaceutical Institute, the title of candidate academician upon Choe Tong Ryun, researcher of Kim Il Sung University, Mun Ho, room chief of the State Academy of Sciences, An Jong Hwa, researcher of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, and others.
					
					 Professorship went to Ri Jong Ik, room chief, and So Kuk Thae, researcher of the Academy of Social Sciences, doctorate to Ju Yong Hun, vice dean of a faculty of Kim Il Sung University, Ko Tong Chan, head of a department of Pyongyang University of Medicine of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Song Guk, head of a department of University of Science, Kim Chun Guk, room chief of Hamghung University of Medicine, and others and the degree of associate professor to 76 intellectuals.

articles.title: Intl Day of Old Persons Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
Intl Day of Old Persons Observed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Diverse cultural events were held on Friday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the Federation for the Care of the Elderly of Korea on the occasion of the 20th International Day of Old Persons.
					 Angling competitions, folk amusement games, art performances, film shows, etc. for old persons took place on the bank of the River Taedong, in parks and recreation grounds, at theatres and cinemas in Pyongyang.
					
					 They were served food at catering establishments including Chongryu Restaurant and Pyongyang Noodle Restaurant. They spent pleasant time together with their grandsons and granddaughters at Kaeson Youth Park which presented spectacular night scenery.
					
					 Officials of Party and power organs, youth and students and children visited the families of war veterans, persons of distinguished services and centenarians and the homes for the aged to present them with souvenirs and sing songs, delighting the aged persons.
					
					 Cultural events also took place in various parts of the country Friday on the same occasion.

articles.title: Bird Flu Vaccine Developed
articles.content:
Bird Flu Vaccine Developed
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Researchers of Pyongyang University of Medicine, attached to Kim Il Sung University, has recently developed a hemagglutinin vaccine against avian influenza virus H5N1.
					 The vaccine, with no side effect on human body, was highly appreciated for its unique manufacturing method at the 11th National Exhibition of Inventions and New Technologies held some time ago.
					
					 The clinical examination results show the anti-body positive rate of the vaccine is much higher than that recommended by the World Health Organization (WHO).

articles.title: Park Attached to Maternity Hospital
articles.content:
Park Attached to Maternity Hospital
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- There is a park in front of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					 Seen in the park are men presenting floral bunches to their wives coming out of the hospital with newborn babies.
					
					 Couples taking a walk with their babies, families sharing joy for newborn babies and men waiting for their wives on benches with floral bunches in their hands are also seen in the park.
					
					 The park, thick with various species of trees and flowers, is furnished with shaded benches, tables and other resting facilities. 
					
					 It is also equipped with fountains of umbrella, rainbow, hedgehog and other shapes.

articles.title: GNP Accused of Kicking up Row about "Principal Enemy"
articles.content:
GNP Accused of Kicking up Row about "Principal Enemy"
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The "Grand National Party" of south Korea is crying out for defining the DPRK as the "principal enemy" in the "defense white paper", ballyhooing about the warship case at a time when a series of dialogues and contacts are taking place between the north and the south.
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 It is demanded by the people that the south Korean group of traitors make apology for orchestrating the hideous farce called the warship case and bringing the inter-Korean relations to a collapse under this pretext. Nevertheless, the GNP is making the above-said outcry, a clear indication that it has gone extremely mad with confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' action to define the DPRK as the "principal enemy" in their "defense white paper" would mean adopting the confrontation and war against compatriots as a policy and officially declaring it internally and externally.
					
					 The GNP gentries are going into inveterate fit of antagonizing fellow countrymen for fear of the process to improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The above-said ruckus kicked up by the GNP cursed and denounced by the fellow countrymen is as foolish an act as bringing earlier the day when it will face a stern judgment of the nation as it will only add to its crimes. The GNP would be well advised to behave itself, aware that the inter-Korean relations deteriorated by its moves to escalate confrontation with fellow countrymen would be harmful to it either.

articles.title: Joint Air Maneuvers Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint Air Maneuvers Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The second air brigade of the second division of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the 37th division of the south Korean puppet forces staged joint air maneuvers in the areas of Jungphyong and Chungju of North Chungchong Province on Sept. 28, according to the south Korean Yonhap News. 
					 The warmongers prattled that the maneuvers were aimed to boost the capability for air maneuver operations and strengthen cooperation system. 
					
					 Their helicopters such as UH-60, AH-64 and AH-1S were busy with the war exercises, airlifting artillery pieces from Jungphyong to Chungju. 
					
					 These madcap war exercises targeted against the DPRK are increasing the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula with each passing day.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message from Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message from Chongryon
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory message by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on September 29. 
					 The message said that it is the greatest honor and happiness of not only the people in homeland but Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and a great event of the whole nation to have again Kim Jong Il at the top post of the Workers' Party of Korea, adding that he represents the homeland and his high prestige precisely means the dignity of the country. 
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il has led the revolutionary cause of Juche started by President Kim Il Sung to shining victory, developed the WPK into the party of the President, an invincible revolutionary party of Juche type, turned Korea of Juche into a political and ideological power based on single-minded unity, a military power possessed of tremendous nuclear deterrence and a scientific and technological power which pushed back the frontiers of latest science and technology and ushered in a new era of prosperity in this land unprecedented in the nation's history spanning 5,000 years, the message stressed that his immortal revolutionary exploits would remain brilliantly shining in the history of the country.
					
					 You are boundlessly respected and trusted by all the fellow countrymen and the world people as you have ushered in the June 15 era of reunification advancing, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself," and made a great contribution to accomplishing the cause of independence against imperialism, the just cause of defending global peace and stability, the message said, adding that Chongryon would consolidate as firm as a rock the organization which was formed by the President and has been steered by the leader with benevolent care as an overseas patriotic organization making a genuine contribution to carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, always holding the President and the leader in high esteem.

articles.title: Meeting Held to Protest against Exclusion of Korean Schools
articles.content:
Meeting Held to Protest against Exclusion of Korean Schools
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Tokyo on Sept. 26 to protest against the exclusion of Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					 Present there were officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans, students of Korean schools, Japanese figures and representatives of Japanese senior high schools in Kanto area. 
					
					 Speeches were made there by Kazuo Hasegawa, representative of the Liaison Council against the Exclusion of Korean Schools from the Tuition-free Program for Senior High Schools, Kusuo Ooshima, member of the House of Representatives from the Japan Democratic Party, Nobuto Hosaka, former member of the House of Representatives from the Social-Democratic Party of Japan, and Seizaburo Eguchi, representative of the Tokyo Ward Assemblymen's Liaison Council for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship.
					
					 The speakers held that the action taken to exclude the Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools should be retracted as it is an unpardonable action for national discrimination. The right of the children to learning should not be linked with politics, they asserted. 
					
					 Read out at the meeting were messages of solidarity from dietmen from different political parties of Japan. 
					
					 Representatives of students of Korean schools delivered reports on their activities. 
					
					 Then the floor was taken by representatives of organizations grouping Koreans of different circles and representatives of students of Japanese schools. 
					
					 A resolution was adopted at the meeting. 
					
					 The resolution strongly urged the Japanese government to stop the discrimination against Koreans in Japan and its infringement upon their human rights and immediately apply the above-said program to the Korean schools.  
					
					 At the end of the meeting its participants staged a demonstration along streets of Tokyo, holding placards reading "No Discrimination against Korean Schools!" and others.

articles.title: Ecuadorian Title of Honorary Professor to Three Commanders
articles.content:
Ecuadorian Title of Honorary Professor to Three Commanders
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of "Luis Vargas Torres" Esmeraldas University of Technology of Ecuador on Sept. 21 decided to confer the title of honorary professor on President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Its written decision said: The Secretariat of "Luis Vargas Torres" Esmeraldas University of Technology decides to award the title of honorary professor to HE President Kim Il Sung, HE Marshal Kim Jong Il and Mrs. Kim Jong Suk, as a token of trust in the Korean people and the Korean revolution guided by the Juche idea and reflecting the desire of the teaching staff of the university for the fraternal ties and solidarity with the Korean people.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Russia
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Russia on Sept. 19 to condemn the south Korean authorities' anti-reunification moves and support the just cause of the people in the DPRK.
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Kang Igor, chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea in Saratov of Russia, denounced traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea for getting evermore pronounced in the moves against the era of independent reunification while persisting in the submission to the U.S. and the policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					  He disclosed that the south Korean authorities totally denied the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and talked nonsense that it is impossible to realize the unification with the north possessed of nuclear weapons and hard to solve the inter-Korean issues.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" should take into account the bitter lesson of the U.S. which suffered the shameful defeat in its attempt to force the DPRK into "dismantling its nukes first", he urged.
					
					 The participants in the meeting strongly protested against the south Korean authorities' moves of confrontation with the DPRK and expressed full support to the just cause of its people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Feats Praised in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Feats Praised in Peru
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting took place in Peru on Sept. 23 to commemorate the 61st death anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 Attending it were personages of public organizations and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people, including the Peruvian People's Women Union and the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, and popular masses. 
					
					 The ambassador and an official of the DPRK embassy in Lima were present on invitation.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Ruth Anchorena, general secretary of the Peruvian People's Women Union, said that Kim Jong Suk was a great revolutionary who devoted her all to the freedom and independence of Korea and the genuine life of the Korean women and a paragon of all the women in the world.
					
					 Felix Fernandes Torres, secretary general of the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, praised Kim Jong Suk as an ardent patriot and true revolutionary who dedicated her all to the revolutionary cause led by President Kim Il Sung. The greatest exploit performed by her was that she provided the bright future of Korea, the speaker added.
					
					He stressed that Korean socialism is invincible thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il who fully inherited the idea and personality of the President.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Celebrated in Mexico
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Celebrated in Mexico
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism released the 46th issue of its bulletin to commemorate the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin carried a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and an article titled "Guide of socialist cause".
					
					 In the article the bulletin said that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung has developed into an experienced and seasoned party always leading the people to victory in any storm and ordeal and an invincible party enjoying absolute support and trust from all the people.
					
					 Elaborating on the fact that the WPK has adopted the correct line and policies in every period and at every stage of the revolution and construction and always won victory after victory with reliance on the strength of the popular masses, the bulletin said:
					
					 The Korean people have keenly realized through practical experience that victory and glory are always in store for them when they follow the WPK and its leadership guarantees the sure victory of the socialist cause.
					
					 The socialist cause of the Korean people led by the WPK will certainly emerge victorious.

articles.title: Just Cause of WPK and Korean People Supported
articles.content:
Just Cause of WPK and Korean People Supported
 Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, issued a statement on Sept. 26 to mark the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement noted that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung has performed great feats in the revolution and construction while leading the Korean people's struggle as the general staff of the revolution.
					
					 The 65 year-long history of the WPK is the glorious history in which it has turned the DPRK into a socialist power and led the human cause of independence to shining victory, it said, and went on:
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il has led the WPK to creditably discharge its mission and role as the guiding force of the Songun cause, holding fast to the Juche idea as the eternal guiding idea.
					
					 Wishing the WPK led by Kim Jong Il greater victory, we reaffirm that we will invariably support the just cause of the WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: Pyongyaneses felicitan la reeleccion de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Pyongyaneses felicitan la reeleccion de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 de septiembre en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de los ciudadanos de Pyongyang para felicitar la reeleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					 Al acto asistieron junto con mas de 150 mil capitalinos de diferentes sectores los cuadros directivos: Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, Ju Sang Song, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Thae Nam, Kim Rak Hui, Thae Jong Su y Kim Phyong Hae, los funcionarios de los organos del partido y el Poder, organizaciones de masas, ministerios, organos centrales y las universidades, los funcionarios y benemeritos de las fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas.
					
					  Hizo uso de la palabra en la ocasion Mun Kyong Tok, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					  La reeleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del PTC deviene la expresion del absoluto apoyo y confianza del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea depositados en el, maximo representante y lider del partido, y un gran evento politico que mostro patentemente la inconmovible conviccion y voluntad de todo el ejercito y pueblo de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la direccion del partido, dijo el orador.
					
					  Gracias a este acontecimiento, se ha abierto el brillante futuro del partido y la revolucion de Corea y se ha dado la garantia decisiva de la prosperidad eterna de nuestra nacion, subrayo.
					
					  El Dirigente es el simbolo de la dignidad y honor de la patria y la nacion y la bandera de todas las victorias y glorias, agrego y continuo que el dirigio durante medio siglo el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea con su extraordinaria capacidad politico-militar superando con valentia las severas pruebas y realizando imborrables hazanas que se registraran eternamente en la historia de la nacion de Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Todos los militantes del partido, oficiales y soldados del ejercito popular y habitantes deben defender en lo politico e ideologico y a costa de la vida al Dirigente y consolidar ferreamente la unidad monolitica de las filas del partido y la revolucion en torno a el, enfatizo.
					
					  En la ocasion hubo discursos de los delegados de varios sectores.
					
					  Los oradores rindieron la maxima gloria y la mas calurosa felicitacion al Dirigente y juraron dedicar lo todo a festejar el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del partido como gran festival de triunfadores y a coronar la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Actos festivos por la reeleccion de Kim Jong Il como Secretario General
articles.content:
Actos festivos por la reeleccion de Kim Jong Il como Secretario General
 Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero el acto del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo para festejar la reeleccion del Dirigente   Kim Jong Il como Secretario General del PTC.
					 Participaron el ministro Ju Sang Song y otros funcionarios y miembros del MINSEP, oficiales y soldados de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea. 
					
					  En la ocasion los oradores senalaron que la ratificacion del Dirigente en el supremo puesto del PTC es un gran evento politico en la lucha por fortalecer mas el PTC y adelantar el triunfo final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  Gracias a tener al Comandante Supremo en el puesto cimero del partido y la revolucion, se ha preparado la garantia decisiva para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la gran bandera del Songun y se abrio el futuro mas radiante en el avance de la Corea de Kim Il Sung, subrayaron.
					
					  Todos los militantes del partido y otros miembros de los organos de seguridad del pueblo, los oficiales y soldados de las FPIC deben tener la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de que la prosperidad de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y la eterna felicidad del pueblo coreano se aseguran por el Dirigente, y defender a costa de la vida el Comite Central del Partido encabezado por el, enfatizaron.
					
					  El mismo dia, se efectuaron actos similares de los obreros y gremiales de la Federacion General de los Sindicados de Corea y de los jovenes y estudiantes en el recinto del Museo de la Fundacion del Partido y en el Teatro al Aire Libre en el Parque de la Juventud, respectivamente.
					
					  Estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del PTC Choe Ryong Hae y otros funcionarios. 
					
					  En los actos hubo informes y discursos.
					
					  Los oradores senalaron que gracias a la sabia direccion del Dirigente, se lleva adelante de siglo en siglo la orgullosa historia de gran auge revolucionario, se crean por todas las partes del pais los eventos relevantes que tocan a la puerta de la gran potencia prospera y se producen en todas las unidades y puestos de trabajo constantes innovaciones y saltos.
					
					  Subrayaron la necesidad de consolidar por todos los medios el poderio militar de la Corea del Songun, dando importancia a los asuntos militares y poniendo de pleno manifiesto el ambiente de apoyo al ejercito, y registrar un gran oleaje de grandes innovaciones y saltos en todos los dominios y unidades de la economia nacional.
					
					  Es definitiva nuestra victoria, gracias a contar con el Dirigente en el supremo puesto del partido y la revolucion, afirmaron y exhortaron a todos a luchar con mas energia por el triunfo final de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista siguiendo a la direccion del Partido.
					
					  El mismo dia, se realizaron los actos similares en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur y del Norte, y de Hwanghae del Norte.

articles.title: Conversaciones de trabajo militar Norte-Sur
articles.content:
Conversaciones de trabajo militar Norte-Sur
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el 30 de septiembre en el area surcoreana de Phanmunjom las conversaciones militares de trabajo entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea en relacion con que en los ultimos dias se tornan cada vez mas graves el lanzamiento de volantes y la penetracion maritima por las fuerzas belicistas conservadoras del Sur de Corea en las aguas jurisdiccionales de la parte norcoreana del Mar Oeste de Corea.
					 En la ocasion el primer coronel del Ejercito Popular de Corea Ri Son Gwon, quien preside la delegacion de la parte norcoreana, se refirio a que surgen los graves casos intolerables por mas tiempo en la ejecucion del acuerdo militar de ambas partes aprobado segun la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de implementacion de la primera.
					
					 Ultimamente, la parte surcoreana perpetro el acto provocativo anti-RPDC lanzando gran cantidad de volantes por medio de las entidades conservadoras de elementos reaccionarios recalcitrantes en la parte occidental del frente incluyendo el pabellon Rimjin de la ciudad de Phaju y el islote Kanghwa de la provincia de Kyonggi, y en la parte central del frente como la zona de Cholwon de la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea, dijo el y continuo:
					
					  Esto causa el rencor del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC y, en particular, las unidades de artilleria del ejercito popular emplazadas en el frente y su contorno se disponen completamente del estado de tiro para atacar los descubiertos lugares de lanzamiento de volantes.
					
					  Las autoridades militares surcoreanas permiten que numerosos buques de guerra pertenecientes a la segunda flota de la marina de guerra y la policia maritima surcoreanas infiltren en las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC.
					
					 Y perpetran sin vacilacion la grave provocacion que amenaza la seguridad personal de los militares norcoreanos haciendo que sus buques de guerra se enfrentaran con los buques patrulleros de la RPDC que cumplen su mision normal.
					
					  Ahora que las relaciones Norte-Sur estan en un dilema grave, la parte surcoreana debe pedir disculpa por sus actos provocativos anti-RPDC en la tierra y el mar, castigar duramente a los promotores y tomar las medidas responsables para prevenir la repeticion de los casos, exigio Ri.
					
					  Pero, la parte surcoreana insistio en la supuesta "medida responsable" sobre el caso de la corbeta "Cheonan" y presento las injustas insistencias como el "cese de la censura a las autoridades" y el "paro de la agravacion de la tenson en el Mar Oeste" frente a la justa critica de la parte Norte.
					
					  Al respecto, la parte Norte aclaro que hablar hasta la fecha del invento torpe no reconocido por nadie resulta un acto absurdo y no pasa de ser un asqueroso comportamiento de los criminales de categoria especial para evitar a toda costa la severa sentencia de la epoca y la historia y expuso la siguiente posicion de principios:
					
					  El hecho de que las autoridades surcoreanas no aceptan hasta la fecha el grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC demuestra que ellas temen de sus delitos y estan inquietas por revelarse los verdaderos aspectos.
					
					  Son iguales casos tambien los problemas del "cese de la censura a las autoridades" y el "paro de la agravacion de la tenson en el Mar Oeste" de que habla la parte surcoreana.
					
					  Si bien las autoridades surcoreanas hubieran respetado y ejecutado las declaraciones arriba mencionadas, no se habria presentado el asunto de "censura a las autoridades" y, en particular, si ellas no hubieran negado la justa propuesta de la RPDC para instalar la zona especial por la paz y colaboracion en el Mar Oeste como aclarara la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, no habria existido tambien el conflicto armado y la agravacion de la tension en esa zona maritima.
					
					  Finalmente, la parte norcoreana se refirio a los problemas de principios para superar la actual tension de la Peninsula Coreana y lograr la paz y prosperidad comunes de la nacion.
					
					  Y enfatizo en que si la parte surcoreana no pone de inmediato fin a los actos provocativos contra la RPDC en la  tierra y el mar, no podra liberarse jamas de la responsabilidad de la consecuencia catastrofica que emane de ello.

articles.title: Tiene lugar tercer contacto de expertos de la cruz roja Norte-Sur
articles.content:
Tiene lugar tercer contacto de expertos de la cruz roja Norte-Sur
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en Kaesong la tercera ronda del contacto de expertos de la cruz roja del Norte y el Sur de Corea para el encuentro de los familiares y parientes que viven separados en ambas partes coreanas.
					 En esta ocasion la parte Norte  propuso un acuerdo que regula racionalmente los problemas no definidos en los dos contactos pasados incluyendo el de lugar del encuentro y lo consulto con la Sur.
					
					En particular, acepto magnanimemente la peticion de la parte Sur de definir el lugar del encuentro como la sala de visitas del monte Kumgang partiendo de la noble fraternidad y la posicion humanitaria y decidio realizarla. 
					
					 Gracias a los esfuerzos activos y sinceros de la parte Norte, en el presente contacto, ambas partes aprobaron un acuerdo de realizar el proximo encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados en la sala de visitas y el Hotel del monte Kumgang desde el 30 de octubre hasta el 5 de noviembre y de  hacer los dias 26 y 27 de octubre en Kaesong las conversaciones de la cruz roja del Norte y el Sur para resolver los problemas humanitarios incluida la realizacion normal del encuentro arriba mencionado. 
					
					 Con ello, llegaron a dar gran alegria a todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar que aspiran a la realizacion exitosa del encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados.

articles.title: Pak Kil Yon interviene en reunion de cancilleres del Grupo de los 77
articles.content:
Pak Kil Yon interviene en reunion de cancilleres del Grupo de los 77
Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- El vicecanciller Pak Kil Yon, jefe de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pronuncio un discurso en la reunion de los cancilleres del Grupo de los 77 efectuada el 28 de septiembre en la sede de la ONU durante el 65o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					  Subrayo que una serie de cambios ocurridos en las relaciones economicas internacionales en los ultimos anos comprueba que es justa la opcion del Grupo de los 77 de promover activamente el establecimiento del imparcial orden economico.
					
					  Los justos esfuerzos de los paises miembros de este grupo por desarrollar la economia nacional y defender la soberania tropiezan con serios desafios y en el mundo se agranda cada vez mas el abismo entre ricos y pobres, senalo y anadio que los paises en vias de desarrollo sufren danos directos por las crisis de economia financiera y alimentaria en escala mundial.
					
					  Ratifico que el establecimiento de las imparciales relaciones economicas internacionales deviene, como lo era antes, la meta primordial del Grupo de los 77 y prosiguio:
					
					  Si no arregla la contradiccion estructural de las actuales relaciones economicas internacionales parciales, no pueden disolver la crisis de la economia financiera mundial.
					
					  Segun la resolucion sobre "La aspiracion al nuevo orden economico internacional" aprobada en la reunion del 64o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU por iniciativa del Grupo de los 77, esta organizacion internacional debe tomar las medidas practicas para ejecutarla.
					
					  El Grupo de los 77 tiene que seguir guiando los esfuerzos de los paises del Sur por ampliar y fortalecer la cooperacion Sur-Sur.
					
					  Tambien debe ejecutar continuamente y sinceramente el programa de accion y los planes de objetos para la cooperacion Sur-Sur ya aprobados tomando por guia firme la ampliacion y el desarrollo de la cooperacion Sur-Sur para contribuir activamente al desarrollo economico de los paises del Sur.
					
					  En lo adelante tambien, el Gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea quedara fiel al noble objetivo y la mision del Grupo de los 77 para establecer un nuevo orden economico internacional basado a la justicia, la igualdad y la imparcialidad.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia maniobras fratricidas del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia maniobras fratricidas del Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 1 de octubre (ATCC) -- En estos tiempos en que se promueven varios dialogos y contactos entre ambas partes coreanas, el "Gran Partido Nacional" del Sur de Corea, enloquecido por la confrontacion fratricida, insiste en la necesidad de anotar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "enemigo principal" en la "carta blanca de defensa nacional", pretextando el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan".
					  Revela el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este viernes y prosigue:
					
					  Los habitantes demandan a la banda traidora surcoreana pedir disculpa por haber inventado tal caso y llevado a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					  La anotacion de la RPDC como "enemigo principal" en la "carta blanca de defensa nacional" significaria declarar oficialmente al interior y exterior del pais la politizacion de la confrontacion y la guerra contra los connacionales.
					
					  Los compinches del "GPN" arman ese alboroto acostumbrado contra los connacionales, porque no quieren la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					  Si el "GPN", repudiado por toda la nacion, se aferra con frenesi a la confrontacion fratricida insistiendo en su teoria de "enemigo principal", se agrandaran sus crimenes y se adelantara el dia de someterse a la condena severa por la nacion.
					
					  El "GPN" debe actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que no vale nada para si mismo el empeoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas mediante la confrontacion fratricida.
